ROOT.GetLineAcrossCount: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_TOWER_ACROSS_INFO WHERE LINE_ID={0} same:if3k
ROOT.GetLineAcross: SELECT min_tower_id,max_tower_id,across_type,ACROSS_OBJ_ID,O.NAME AS across_name ,across_longitude as longitude,across_latitude as latitude,A.ID FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_TOWER_ACROSS_INFO A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT 2 as TYPE,id||'' AS ID,name AS NAME FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_highway_info UNION ALL SELECT 3,ID||'',NAME FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_railway_info UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT A.ACROSS_TYPE,A.ACROSS_OBJ_ID,NVL(B.NAME,D.NAME) FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_tower_across_info A LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B B ON A.ACROSS_OBJ_ID=B.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B D ON A.ACROSS_OBJ_ID=D.ID WHERE A.ACROSS_TYPE=1 AND A.LINE_ID={0} ) O ON A.ACROSS_TYPE=O.TYPE AND A.ACROSS_OBJ_ID=O.ID WHERE A.LINE_ID={0} same:if3k
ROOT.GetLine: SELECT DISTINCT L.ID,L.NAME,V.NAME AS VOLTAGE,S1.NAME AS START_ST,S2.NAME AS END_ST,D.NAME_ABBREVIATION AS DISPATCH ,M.NAME_ABBREVIATION AS MONITOR ,Z.NAME_ABBREVIATION AS ZICHAN ,OPERATE_DATE,RUNNING_STATE FROM ( SELECT ID,NAME,VOLTAGE_TYPE,START_ST_ID,END_ST_ID,DISPATCH_ORG_ID,MONITOR_ORG_ID,ASSETS_COMPANY_ID,OPERATE_DATE,RUNNING_STATE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B UNION ALL SELECT ID,NAME,VOLTAGE_TYPE,START_ST_ID,END_ST_ID,DISPATCH_ORG_ID,MONITOR_ORG_ID,ASSETS_COMPANY_ID,OPERATE_DATE,RUNNING_STATE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B ) L LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE V ON L.VOLTAGE_TYPE=V.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_COMMONSUBSTATION_B S1 ON L.START_ST_ID=S1.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_COMMONSUBSTATION_B S2 ON L.END_ST_ID=S2.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_DCC_B D ON L.DISPATCH_ORG_ID=D.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_DCC_B M ON L.MONITOR_ORG_ID=M.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_COMPANY_B Z ON L.ASSETS_COMPANY_ID=Z.ID JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_TOWER_ACROSS_INFO A ON L.ID=A.LINE_ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_highway_info B ON A.ACROSS_TYPE=2 AND A.ACROSS_OBJ_ID=B.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_railway_info C ON A.ACROSS_TYPE=3 AND A.ACROSS_OBJ_ID=C.ID WHERE L.NAME LIKE '%{0}%' OR B.NAME LIKE '%{0}%' OR C.NAME LIKE '%{0}%' ORDER BY L.NAME
ROOT.GetLineStations: SELECT S AS SID,S1.NAME AS SNAME,E AS EID,S2.NAME AS ENAME,L.NAME AS LNAME,V.NAME AS VNAME,P.NAME_ABBREVIATION AS GRIDNAME,D.NAME_ABBREVIATION AS DISPATCHNAME,L.LENGTH,L.MODEL,A.IMAXLONG_20 AS IMAX,L.OPERATE_DATE,start_tower_id,end_tower_id FROM ( SELECT ID,START_ST_ID AS S,END_ST_ID AS E,NAME,VOLTAGE_TYPE,GRID_ID,DISPATCH_ORG_ID,OPERATE_DATE,LENGTH,MODEL,start_tower_id,end_tower_id FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B WHERE ID='{0}' UNION ALL SELECT ID,START_ST_ID,END_ST_ID,NAME,VOLTAGE_TYPE,GRID_ID,DISPATCH_ORG_ID,OPERATE_DATE,LENGTH,MODEL,start_tower_id,end_tower_id FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B WHERE ID='{0}' ) L LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE V ON L.VOLTAGE_TYPE=V.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B P ON L.GRID_ID=P.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_DCC_B D ON L.DISPATCH_ORG_ID=D.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_COMMONSUBSTATION_B S1 ON L.S=S1.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_COMMONSUBSTATION_B S2 ON L.E=S2.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_P A ON L.ID=A.ID
ROOT.GetLineTower: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T.ID,ISNULL(A.TOWERNAME,D.TOWERNAME) AS TOWERNAME,ISNULL(A.TOWERNO,D.TOWERNO) AS TOWERNO,T.LONGITUDE,T.LATITUDE,X.NAME AS TX,'' AS TC,R.NAME AS REGION,'' as img FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_TOWER_B T LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_REGION R ON T.REGION=R.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_TOWERTYPE X ON T.TYPE=X.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_r_tower A ON T.ID=A.TOWER_ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_r_tower D ON T.ID=D.TOWER_ID WHERE (A.LINE_ID={0} OR D.LINE_ID={0}) ) T WHERE towerno>0 order by towerno
ROOT.GetLineSeg: SELECT L.ID,MODEL,LENGTH,BEGIN_TOWER_ID,END_TOWER_ID,O.NAME AS MAINT_ORG_ID,ON_TIME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINESEG_B L LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_MAINTORG_B O ON L.MAINT_ORG_ID=O.ID WHERE GRID_ID='{0}' UNION ALL SELECT L.ID,MODEL,LENGTH,BEGIN_TOWER_ID,END_TOWER_ID,O.NAME AS MAINT_ORG_ID,ON_TIME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINESEG_B L LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_MAINTORG_B O ON L.MAINT_ORG_ID=O.ID WHERE DCLINE_ID='{0}'
ROOT.GetSameLineInfo: SELECT L.ID,L.NAME,A.C FROM ( SELECT LINE_ID,COUNT(1) AS C FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_r_tower WHERE LINE_ID IN ( SELECT SAMETWR_LINE_ID FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_LINE_R_SAMETOWER WHERE LINE_ID='{0}' ) GROUP BY LINE_ID ) A JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B L ON A.LINE_ID=L.ID UNION ALL SELECT L.ID,L.NAME,A.C FROM ( SELECT LINE_ID,COUNT(1) AS C FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_r_tower WHERE LINE_ID IN ( SELECT SAMETWR_LINE_ID FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_LINE_R_SAMETOWER WHERE LINE_ID='{0}' ) GROUP BY LINE_ID ) A JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B L ON A.LINE_ID=L.ID
ROOT.GetAcrossRecentWeather: select w.weather_condition_result as weathertype from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_WEATHER_REAL_INFO w JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_TOWER_WEATHER_SOURCE r ON w.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID=r.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_TOWER_ACROSS_INFO a ON r.TOWER_ID=a.MIN_TOWER_ID WHERE A.ID={0} ORDER BY CREATETIME DESC
ROOT.GetAcrossLineOne: SELECT L.ID,V.NAME AS VOLNAME,L.NAME,D.NAME_ABBREVIATION AS DISPATCHNAME ,A.TOWERMIN_STA_DISTANCE,A.TOWERMAX_STA_DISTANCE,A.ACROSS_LONGITUDE,A.ACROSS_LATITUDE ,A.MIN_TOWER_ID,A.MAX_TOWER_ID,A.LINE_OPERATION_DEP,A.TOWER_SMALL_TYPE,A.TOWER_BIG_TYPE,A.ACROSS_TOPOGRAPHY,A.ACROSS_DISTANCE,A.ACROSS_REGION,A.REPORT_UNIT,A.REPORT_DATE,a.ACROSS_WAY,A.ISGUODIAO,A.ID AS AID FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_tower_across_info A JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName {0} L ON A.ACROSS_OBJ_ID=L.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE V ON L.VOLTAGE_TYPE=V.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_DCC_B D ON L.DISPATCH_ORG_ID=D.ID WHERE A.ACROSS_TYPE=1 AND A.LINE_ID={1} same:if3k
ROOT.GetAcrossHighwayOne: SELECT L.ID,V.NAME AS VOLNAME,h.NAME,D.NAME_ABBREVIATION AS DISPATCHNAME ,A.TOWERMIN_STA_DISTANCE,A.TOWERMAX_STA_DISTANCE,A.ACROSS_LONGITUDE,A.ACROSS_LATITUDE ,A.MIN_TOWER_ID,A.MAX_TOWER_ID,A.LINE_OPERATION_DEP,A.TOWER_SMALL_TYPE,A.TOWER_BIG_TYPE,A.ACROSS_TOPOGRAPHY,A.ACROSS_DISTANCE,A.ACROSS_REGION,A.REPORT_UNIT,A.REPORT_DATE,a.ACROSS_WAY,A.ISGUODIAO,h.YW_ORG_NAME,h.YW_TRAFFIC_DEP,A.ID AS AID FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_tower_across_info A JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_HIGHWAY_INFO h on A.ACROSS_OBJ_ID=h.ID JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName {0} L ON A.LINE_ID=L.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE V ON L.VOLTAGE_TYPE=V.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_DCC_B D ON L.DISPATCH_ORG_ID=D.ID WHERE A.ACROSS_TYPE=2 AND A.LINE_ID={1} same:if3k
ROOT.GetAcrossRailwayOne: SELECT L.ID,V.NAME AS VOLNAME,h.NAME,D.NAME_ABBREVIATION AS DISPATCHNAME ,A.TOWERMIN_STA_DISTANCE,A.TOWERMAX_STA_DISTANCE,A.ACROSS_LONGITUDE,A.ACROSS_LATITUDE ,A.MIN_TOWER_ID,A.MAX_TOWER_ID,A.LINE_OPERATION_DEP,A.TOWER_SMALL_TYPE,A.TOWER_BIG_TYPE,A.ACROSS_TOPOGRAPHY, A.ACROSS_DISTANCE,A.ACROSS_REGION,A.REPORT_UNIT,A.REPORT_DATE,a.ACROSS_WAY,A.ISGUODIAO,h.YW_ORG_NAME,A.ID AS AID FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_tower_across_info A JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_RAILWAY_INFO h on A.ACROSS_OBJ_ID=h.ID JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName {0} L ON A.LINE_ID=L.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE V ON L.VOLTAGE_TYPE=V.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_DCC_B D ON L.DISPATCH_ORG_ID=D.ID WHERE A.ACROSS_TYPE=3 AND A.LINE_ID={1} same:if3k
ROOT.GetAcLineTower: SELECT T.ID,A.TOWERNAME,A.TOWERNO,T.LONGITUDE,T.LATITUDE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_TOWER_B T LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_r_tower A ON T.ID=A.TOWER_ID WHERE A.LINE_ID={0} order by A.towerno
ROOT.GetDcLineTower: SELECT T.ID,A.TOWERNAME,A.TOWERNO,T.LONGITUDE,T.LATITUDE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_TOWER_B T LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_r_tower A ON T.ID=A.TOWER_ID WHERE A.LINE_ID={0} order by A.towerno

AC.GetLineStations: SELECT L.START_ST_ID AS SID,S1.NAME AS SNAME,L.END_ST_ID AS EID,S2.NAME AS ENAME,L.NAME AS LNAME,V.NAME AS VNAME,P.NAME_ABBREVIATION AS GRIDNAME,D.NAME_ABBREVIATION AS DISPATCHNAME,L.LENGTH,L.MODEL,A.IMAXLONG_20 AS IMAX,L.OPERATE_DATE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B L LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE V ON L.VOLTAGE_TYPE=V.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B P ON L.GRID_ID=P.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_DCC_B D ON L.DISPATCH_ORG_ID=D.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_COMMONSUBSTATION_B S1 ON L.START_ST_ID=S1.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_COMMONSUBSTATION_B S2 ON L.END_ST_ID=S2.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_P A ON L.ID=A.ID WHERE L.ID={0}
AC.GetLineTower: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T.ID,A.TOWERNAME,A.TOWERNO,T.LONGITUDE,T.LATITUDE,X.NAME AS TX,'' AS TC,R.NAME AS REGION,'' as img FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_TOWER_B T LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_REGION R ON T.REGION=R.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_TOWERTYPE X ON T.TYPE=X.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_r_tower A ON T.ID=A.TOWER_ID WHERE A.LINE_ID={0} ) T WHERE towerno>0 order by towerno
AC.GetLineSeg: SELECT L.ID,MODEL,LENGTH,BEGIN_TOWER_ID,END_TOWER_ID,O.NAME AS MAINT_ORG_ID,ON_TIME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINESEG_B L LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_MAINTORG_B O ON L.MAINT_ORG_ID=O.ID WHERE GRID_ID={0}

DC.GetLineStations: SELECT L.START_ST_ID AS SID,S1.NAME AS SNAME,L.END_ST_ID AS EID,S2.NAME AS ENAME,L.NAME AS LNAME,V.NAME AS VNAME,P.NAME_ABBREVIATION AS GRIDNAME,D.NAME_ABBREVIATION AS DISPATCHNAME,L.LENGTH,L.MODEL,A.IH AS IMAX,L.OPERATE_DATE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B L LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE V ON L.VOLTAGE_TYPE=V.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B P ON L.GRID_ID=P.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_DCC_B D ON L.DISPATCH_ORG_ID=D.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_COMMONSUBSTATION_B S1 ON L.START_ST_ID=S1.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_COMMONSUBSTATION_B S2 ON L.END_ST_ID=S2.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_P A ON L.ID=A.ID WHERE L.ID={0}
DC.GetLineTower: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T.ID,A.TOWERNAME,A.TOWERNO,T.LONGITUDE,T.LATITUDE,X.NAME AS TX,'' AS TC,R.NAME AS REGION,'' as img FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_TOWER_B T LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_REGION R ON T.REGION=R.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_TOWERTYPE X ON T.TYPE=X.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_r_tower A ON T.ID=A.TOWER_ID WHERE A.LINE_ID={0} ) T WHERE towerno>0 order by towerno
DC.GetLineSeg: SELECT L.ID,MODEL,LENGTH,BEGIN_TOWER_ID,END_TOWER_ID,O.NAME AS MAINT_ORG_ID,ON_TIME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINESEG_B L LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_MAINTORG_B O ON L.MAINT_ORG_ID=O.ID WHERE DCLINE_ID={0}

ROOT.GetAcLineTower1: SELECT T.ID,A.TOWERNAME,A.TOWERNO,T.LONGITUDE,T.LATITUDE,'江苏电网','220kv'，a.lineid,c.name FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_TOWER_B T LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_r_tower A ON T.ID=A.TOWER_ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B C ON C.ID=A.LINE_ID order by A.towerno
ROOT.GetDcLineTower1: SELECT T.ID,A.TOWERNAME,A.TOWERNO,T.LONGITUDE,T.LATITUDE,'江苏电网','220kv'，a.lineid,c.name FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_TOWER_B T LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_r_tower A ON T.ID=A.TOWER_ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B C ON C.ID=A.LINE_ID order by A.towerno
ROOT.Getgzlocation: select case when ST_LineLocatePoint(st_setsrid(geom,4326),st_setsrid(s.geomp,4326))<0.001 then ST_AsText(ST_line_interpolate_point(st_setsrid(geom,4326),{2}/st_length(ST_GeographyFromText(st_astext(geom)))) ) when ST_LineLocatePoint(st_setsrid(geom,4326),st_setsrid(s.geomp,4326))>0.999 THEN ST_AsText(ST_line_interpolate_point(st_setsrid(geom,4326),1-{2}/st_length(ST_GeographyFromText(st_astext(geom)))) ) else '' end from acline_dcline_info ,( select distinct geom as geomp from stationpoint where gid ='{1}' ) s where gid='{0}'
